mapper.select: select product_asin as amz_asin,IFNULL(amz_product_normal_count,0) as amz_product_normal_count, IFNULL(amz_product_not_normal_count,0) as amz_product_not_normal_count from tab_product_location where keyword=#{keyWord} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(search_date)

select max(c.asin_session) asin_session ,max(c.unit_order) unit_order,sum(a.Clicks) clicks,sum(a.Spend) spend, sum(a.Day1_TotalOrders) Day7_TotalOrders from searchterm a inner JOIN (select distinct campaign_id,Advertised_ASIN from amzasin) b on a.campaign_id=b.campaign_id inner join (select sum(asin_session) asin_session,child_asin,sum(unit_order) unit_order from sp_api_report where child_asin=#{asin} and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL ${dateRange} DAY) <= date(create_date)) C on b.Advertised_ASIN=c.child_asin where b.Advertised_ASIN=#{asin} and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL ${dateRange} DAY) <= date(a.date) GROUP BY b.Advertised_ASIN

select a.Customer_Search_Term,sum(a.Clicks) as clicks,round(sum(a.Spend)/sum(a.Clicks),2) cpc,max(c.unit_order) unit_order,sum(a.Day1_TotalOrders) Day7_TotalOrders, sum(a.impressions) as impressions from searchterm a inner JOIN (select distinct campaign_id,Advertised_ASIN from amzasin) b on a.campaign_id=b.campaign_id inner join (select child_asin,sum(unit_order) unit_order from sp_api_report where child_asin=#{asin} and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL ${dateRange} DAY) <= date(create_date)) c on b.Advertised_ASIN=c.child_asin where b.Advertised_ASIN=#{asin} and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL ${dateRange} DAY) <= date(a.date) GROUP BY a.Customer_Search_Term ORDER BY clicks desc limit 20

select tmp_search.keyword as Customer_Search_Term,tmp_search.amz_product_normal_count,tmp_search.amz_product_not_normal_count from
(select keyword,search_date,min(IFNULL(amz_product_normal_count,0)) amz_product_normal_count ,min(IFNULL(amz_product_not_normal_count,0) ) amz_product_not_normal_count from tab_product_location where product_asin=#{asin} group by keyword,search_date) as tmp_search
inner join ( select keyword,max(search_date) search_date from
(select keyword,search_date,min(IFNULL(amz_product_normal_count,0)) amz_product_normal_count ,min(IFNULL(amz_product_not_normal_count,0) ) amz_product_not_normal_count from tab_product_location where product_asin=#{asin} group by keyword,search_date) as tab
group by keyword) tab1 on tmp_search.keyword=tab1.keyword and tmp_search.search_date=tab1.search_date
select asin as amz_asin,title,img from asin_list_detail where asin=#{asin}
